channel.title: Runeshock - Passive Mode - Real RS Drop Formula - Player Sleeping - Customizable
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/140vgd5.png[/img] [i][b]Join today and enter your own experience multiplier between one, and 2500.[/b][/i] Play [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/2pcz2yn8218e421/.Runeshock.jar?dl=1]here[/url]: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/2pcz2yn8218e421/.Runeshock.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/2pcz2yn8218e421/.Runeshock.jar?dl=1[/url] Forums [url=http://runeshock.zapto.org]here[/url]: [url=http://Runeshock.zapto.org]Runeshock.zapto.org[/url]
[B][I]Related Threads:[/I][/B] [url=http://share.pho.to/4e3pp]World of Runeshock[/url] - Old Media [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657933.0.html]Runeshock Resting[/url] - Currently in progress. [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657792.0.html]Runeshock Drops[/url] - The Real RS Formula [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659985.0.html]Runeshock Passive Mode[/url] - Outdated version
[b][i]Information:[/i][/b] [CODE] Server Core Redone. Player Saving Redone. IP/ISP/Mac Added (Banning Purposes) Interact-able Objects (60% Complete) Interact-able NPC's (10% Complete) Herblore Redone (100% Complete) Thieving Redone (85% Complete) Farming Started (15% Complete) Experience Multiplier (1-2500X). King Black Dragon (Poison, Freeze, Shock). Warriors Guild (Recently Added). Pest Control (85% complete). Fight Caves (Jad Only). Passive Mode (Disable, Enable PVP) [/CODE]
[i][b]Server Media:[/b][/i] [url=http://pho.to/8f3Zk]Dialogues[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3dd]Minigames[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3eP]Passive Mode[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3ev]Tabs + Legend[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/8f3g8]New Bank Interface[/url]
[i][b]Combat Media:[/b][/i] The following combat media is from: [url=http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/]http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/[/url] This is done so to spare time since we offer the following. item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

Project Territh:

Love oldschool servers bound to check it out!

Not sure if I’ve seen you online yet. All are welcome, it’s a fun community. Although everyone is currently asleep at this time.

Iron-man mode has been added to read more go here: http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Ironman_Mode

item.title: Runeshock - Passive Mode - Real RS Drop Formula - Player Sleeping - Customizable

@Encryption wrote:

[center]
Join today and enter your own experience multiplier between one, and 2500.
Play here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2pcz2yn8218e421/.Runeshock.jar?dl=1
Forums here: Runeshock.zapto.org

[B][I]Related Threads:[/I][/B]
World of Runeshock - Old Media
Runeshock Resting - Currently in progress.
Runeshock Drops - The Real RS Formula
Runeshock Passive Mode - Outdated version

Information:

Server Core Redone. Player Saving Redone. IP/ISP/Mac Added (Banning Purposes) Interact-able Objects (60% Complete) Interact-able NPC's (10% Complete) Herblore Redone (100% Complete) Thieving Redone (85% Complete) Farming Started (15% Complete) Experience Multiplier (1-2500X). King Black Dragon (Poison, Freeze, Shock). Warriors Guild (Recently Added). Pest Control (85% complete). Fight Caves (Jad Only). Passive Mode (Disable, Enable PVP)

Server Media:
Dialogues
Minigames
Passive Mode
Tabs + Legend
New Bank Interface

Combat Media:
The following combat media is from: http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/
This is done so to spare time since we offer the following.
